segments.text: I'd like to order a restock on my minibar .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You finished everything in there , sir ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What would you like to order ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Three bottles each of Perrier and Jim Beam .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Uh-huh . What else do you want ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The apples were great . Could you bring a couple more up ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem . Is there anything else I can get for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Some grape juice would also be nice .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll get all of that for you right away . Someone should be up shortly
segments.speaker: S2
